revised_title: Time-domain Asymptotics and Applications of the Method of Stationary Phase
tldr: The author presents a time-domain version of the method of stationary phase for oscillatory integrals, focusing on the behavior of integrals with periodic functions and discontinuities. The theory is applied to boundary-integral solutions of the wave equation, providing insights into characteristics, rays, and caustics, as well as wave patterns and diffraction phenomena.
